title: Risen Academy is recruiting (G4-P1)
body:
Hey everyone - Risen is trialling again and looking for players of all roles within the ranks of G4-P1 to create a new Academy roster!
We are after players who have a passion for competitive play, good communication skills and a drive to improve.

The trials will take place this Sunday @ 4PM AEST. If you would be interested in applying for a position please feel free to apply here: https://forms.gle/JEfhoTVjk5t6jK4A7
